role.argrole: thing arg0 passes from generation to generation

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP-APP (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 耕读)) (VP (VV 传家))) (DEC 的)) (NP (NN 传统))) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (VP (VV 让) (NP-OBJ (PN 她)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (PP-DIR (P 对) (NP (NN 汉文))) (ADVP (AD 并)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 陌生)))))))
